name: Zlata Ivleva
review1: Acer's Predator Triton 300 SE will make major waves among gaming laptops, with its trim design and punchy RTX 3060 gaming performance at an aggressive price.

name: Molly Flores
review1: MSI's Katana GF66 is a well-priced, well-rounded budget gaming laptop that cuts competing models down to size.

name: Charles Michael Davis
review1: The Asus TUF Gaming FX504G pairs a 1080p IPS display and GeForce GTX 1050 Ti power at an aggressive price. It's a solid budget gaming laptop, but suffers from short battery life.

name: Matthew Buzzi
review1: Acer's 15.6-inch Predator Helios 300 offers solid features for the money and remains an excellent large-screen, midrange gaming machine.

name: Michael Kan
review1: The Zephyrus S17 is a highly capable 17.3-inch gaming machine with exotic touches and a supercar price.

name: Matthew Humphries
review1: The brand-new Alienware x14 joins the upper echelon of 14-inch gaming laptops, delivering a sound gaming experience and fast overall performance in a super-portable design.
